#Rstats: datapasta is SO COOL! Easily copy data from excel (or even html tables from the web) & paste in R as fully-formatted dataframes!

1. install.packages("datapasta")
2. Set a useful keyboard paste shortcuthttps://t.co/hq9mHtRj5B
